aboutUs.ourHistory: Gea personifies the origin of life, being the divinity thatembodies the Earth, femininity and the fullness of strength. Gea represents the earth, but also the vital element of water. It symbolizes that constant flow, an inexhaustible source of creation. GEA focuses on providing professional geological advice and technical solutions.
teamIntro: Our team is composed of a multidisciplinary staff that includes hydrogeologists, geologists and experts from various branches of earth sciences.
team.obj.title: OBJETIVES
team.mision.title: MISSION
team.vision.title: VISIÓN
team.objective: GEA focuses on providing professional geological advice and technical solutions. Our team is composed of multidisciplinary personnel, including hydrogeologists, geologists, and experts from various branches of earth sciences. Our group offers specific tools and accurate quality data management to help understand hydrological resources.
team.valueAddition: Add value to the resources studied through our industry experience. To guarantee the reliability of our services by complying with the current regulations and policies of the employer company. To provide reliability in our services, adapting ourselves to the employer's standards and policies in force.
team.leadership: To occupy a leadership position in the promotion and execution of mining services, with a firm commitment to the promotion of responsible development of the industry, backed by our extensive experience in the Puna region. With our track record on landmark projects in this area, we are in a position to understand the unique needs of both the industry and our valued customers.

sevDescription: It is an economical method used prior to making decisions about drilling a well.
sevBenefits.electricalProperties: It allows understanding the electrical properties of subsurface materials
sevBenefits.aquiferInterfaces: Understanding interfaces of different aquifers: fresh, brackish, salty.
sevBenefits.wellDepthProjection: It allows projecting the depth of a well.
sevBenefits.tentativeDesign: It allows tentatively designing a well.
sevBenefits.geoElectricalSections: With several correlated geoelectric sections in depth, a geoelectric profile can be created.
wellLogging.description: Well logging is a technique that allows the measurement, along the well, of the electrical characteristics of geological formations and the fluids contained within them. Through interpretation, it provides a forecast of the potential and quality of the subsurface hydrogeological resources.
wellLogging.parameters: Geophysical parameters are represented vertically through curves provided by electric well logging. The curves display values for spontaneous potential (SP), point resistivity (SPR), short normal resistivity (SNR), long normal resistivity (LNR), and natural gamma (NG) simultaneously
wellLogging.curveAnalysis: With the curves obtained from Electric Well Logging and their comparison, it is possible to define:
curveAnalysisDetails.wellCompletionDesig: Design well development, filter placement, and blind casing.
technicalDirection.mudLogging: Geological well control or Mud Logging is a technical activity that plays a key role during drilling operations.
technicalDirection.dataManagement: It involves the collection, storage, and interpretation of geological data obtained during well drilling.
technicalDirection.fieldGeologistPresenc: This is carried out with the presence of a field Geologist on the drilling platform.
technicalDirection.rotaryDrillingControl: Geological control tasks in rotary drilling:

mining.gisProcessing: Prospecting / Exploration / GIS processing and satellite imagery
mining.samplingProtocols: Programming, development, and execution of sampling protocols applied to different types of deposits
mining.geologicalLogging: Geological logging and geotechnical logging, photographic record
